briefTitle: Clinical Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of IDP-126 Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle Controlled, Parallel-Group, Clinical Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of IDP-126 Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, vehicle-controlled, 12-week study designed to assess the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of IDP-126 Gel in comparison IDP-126 Vehicle Gel at Weeks 2, 4, 8, and 12.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change From Baseline to Week 12 in Inflammatory Lesion Counts
